name: The Mobility House
overview:
Their approach within the world of smart energy is to realize e-mobility - by emphasizing on individual mobility and fuelled by energy from regenerative resources. Companies and individuals can easily enter the electric mobility area - in a safe, sustainable and affordable way, thereby walking away from fossil fuel consuming solutions from the past.

Ever since 2009 The Mobility House has become one of Europe’s leading providers for electric mobility.

Within the fast-growing market environment we specialize on charging solutions and managing the battery pack for energy storage. We stand for an international access to e-mobility – which is safe and customer-oriented. The quality of our products combined with reasonable prices and optimum customer service, ensure satisfaction of our customers and our business partner.

Operating b2b with the automotive industry, leasing services and energy utilities, and b2c with EV customers: Fulfilling the customers´ needs is our benchmark for competition within the market.
